[addi $1,$0,10, addi $2,$0,3, addi $3,$0,0, addi $5,$0,0, loop:lw $4,0($1), beq $3,$2,exit, add $5,$5,$4, addi $3,$3,1, addi $1,$1,1, j loop, exit:j exit]
